title: 1932년 Scoggins 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Scoggins. 판결일: 1932-06-01. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: SCOGGINS v. STATE
**판결일**: 1932-06-01
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Hawkins

## 변호인

Don Mirike and Harvey P. Shead, both of Longview, for appellant., Lloyd W. Davidson, State’s Atty., of Austin, for the State.

## 인용

- 50 S.W.2d 830

## 판결문 요약


HAWKINS, J.
Conviction is for possession of intoxicating liquor for the purpose of sale, punishment being assessed at one year in the penitentiary.
_ The record is before this court without bills of exception or statement of facts. In such condition nothing is presented for review.
The judgment is affirmed.
...
